Label: conflict-with-acceptlist
Description: Conflicts with an existing accept-list. This code is returned when the DDoS mitigation detects source addresses/prefixes in the accept-listed ACLs are attacking the target.

Label: cuid-collision
Description: CUID Collision. This code is returned when a DOTS client uses a 'cuid' that is already used by another DOTS client.

Label: request-rejected-legitimate-traffic
Description: Mitigation request rejected. This code is returned by the DOTS server to indicate the attack traffic has been classified as legitimate traffic.
